longBusinessSummary: Vivotek Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and sale of wireless network cameras for security surveillance and multimedia network-related products. It operates through four segments: OBM Business, ODM Business, Vatics, Vivotek USA, and Others. The company offers network video servers; H.265 series network cameras, which include box, mobile dome, fixed dome, speed dome, 180-degree panoramic, 360-degree fisheye, and thermal bullet products; multi-sensor network camera series products; automatic people counting camera series products; mobile DVR for transportation applications and license plate recognition cameras; and open platform smart VCA boxes. It also provides ethernet switch solutions, such as industrial network management/non-network management ethernet switches, network management/non-network management ethernet switches, network power extenders, network power injectors, and ethernet network interface converters; security surveillance installation accessories: long-distance infrared light projectors; outdoor waterproof water tanks, and other accessories; video management software; cloud-based monitoring management systems; and high zoom magnification lens modules. In addition, the company engages in the sale of lighting equipment; investment and commercial lease of real estate; design and sale of multimedia integrated circuits; and investment in the network communications industry. It operates in the United States, Taiwan, Canada, the Netherlands, and internationally through distributors. Vivotek Inc. was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
